text: (allah veta) pascattapa vi yomu vana, (ohuta) gætikam karana, (ohuta) prasamsa karana, upavasaya rakina, (næmi) rukuh karana, (nalala bima taba) sujud karana, yahapata vidhanaya karana, ayahapat dæyin valakvalana, tavada allahge simavan suraksa karana yanadi evan (allahgen mahatvu pratiphala laba ganna) deva visvasavantayinta numba subaramci danvanu
